value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We're right back where we started...
And not a step closer to defeating
Hel.$k$pAnd at Princess Veronica's invitation,
we stumbled right into Thrasir's
trap...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Oh? So it's my fault?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Er...no. No, that's not what I meant.
Stop giving me the evil eye!$k$p$EFace_Anger|*sigh* We don't need to argue. We
need a plan.$k$pWhere should we focus our search?
We can't comb an entire continent.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Hmm...$k$p$EFace|I know who has the weapon. I can't
see it being in the hands of anyone
other than Líf himself.$k$pAnd I know just where he is—the
Order of Heroes' castle.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse, you sly dog! Where did all
of this come from?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It's simple. I just thought to myself...
What would I do?$k$pI mean, if anyone understands how
he thinks, it's me. Right?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, Alfonse...$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|I've learned to put my trust in
Alfonse's ideas. As it happens,
we're also out of options...$k$p$EFace_Cool|All right! Order of Heroes...back
to base!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We mustn't delay further...
It's time to confront Líf.$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|Alfonse... I'm leaving.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Veronica...$k$pIf the enemy springs a trap, you'll
stand no chance by yourself. We
will go together.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|No. You must remain. Your plan
has no chance otherwise.$k$pAlfonse?$k$pDo you really believe that Hel will
revive our world?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|...Yes. She has the power.$k$pWe will balance the cohort of the
dead. Then we will reclaim our
realm. Together...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|When I hear you speak, I can't help
but have faith.$k$pStrange, isn't it? Before all this, we
were enemies...$k$pBut since the world fell to ruin, you
are the only one whose words mean
anything to me.$k$pI lost everything. There is only
one thing I have since gained...$k$pYou. Our strange relationship.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Hmph. I suppose so. Both of us
are much changed, it is true...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|If we win—if we get everything back...$k$pWill you still speak with me?
Like this?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Veronica...$k$pI will. I promise.$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
